title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document functional and non-functional requirements of the IoT framework.

title: Design Framework Architecture
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the IoT framework using functional reactive programming.

title: Develop Core Functionalities
description: Implement the core functionalities of the framework such as handling streams of sensor data and device control.

title: Create User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for interacting with the IoT framework.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Build the user interface based on the designed UI.

title: Test Framework Functionality
description: Perform functional and non-functional testing on the IoT framework.

title: Integrate Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the IoT framework and data.

title: Perform Code Audit and Optimization
description: Review and optimize the code for performance and maintainability.

title: Prepare Detailed and Comprehensive Documentation
description: Write detailed, concise, and easy-to-understand documentation for the IoT framework, covering architecture, usage, setup, integration with other systems, security measures, error handling, and performance optimizations. Include code examples where necessary.

title: Deploy IoT Framework to Production
description: Deploy the IoT framework to production environment and ensure smooth operation.
